About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

MY BIO:

I am a Junior Full Stack Web Developer based in London - UK. I am passionate about Technology, web development, and brands that work towards better digital interaction. I believe that through my work I can have a positive impact on people's lives.

I have been studying at Trybe, a web development school, since May/2021.

I love computer games, board games, middle-earth, and cyberpunk. I also like going to a pub and enjoying a pint along with a good conversation.

Senac Brasil

Network Technician Student

2007

The Computer Network Technician implements and maintains an infrastructure, access equipment, operating systems and computer network services, applying network security standards and technical standards, in accordance with quality, health and work safety and environmental preservation.

The professional works in public, private and third sector institutions that demand computer networks or in the autonomous provision of services, with an emphasis on the environment, thus enabling the professional to monitor network projects, implement, manage and administer specific services network, both in the physical and in the logical part, always trying to keep the data and computer network secure.

Self-employment is also a market alternative, as small companies, which cannot keep professionals full-time, hire service providers for implementation, support and administration.
